It's a shame because it really is a nice everyday wear perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2270416"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2270416#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2269792" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The 2ml vial has completely won me over with its soft and fresh scent. Will definitely be getting the full size bottle someday</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2266675"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2266675#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263440" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2263440" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jessie James"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1422918"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1422918.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jessie James" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2263440ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2263440" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1422918">Jessie James</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-28">08/28/24 04:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Definitely my most worn and most loved perfume right now in my collection. I don't get a lot of one singular note here, I find everything is blended so well. I don't get much citrus as others have said. It kinda smells like how orange sorbet looks. Beautiful, bright, happy, calming and chic.<br />
<br />
I think the reason I love it so much is because it's such a soft, plush, fresh and clean smell that makes you feel like you just got out of the shower after using the most expensive, luxurious shampoo and conditioner. It gives me luxury resort vibes. A combination of how I imagine the spa would smell, how the clean freshly folded towels would smell, the type of air freshener they'd use in the lobby, the smell of the candle burning on the balcony at night. <br />
<br />
It's romantic. It's attractive. This is IT for me. It's such a vibe and it puts me in a good mood every single time I put it on. It's definitely sexy in an effortless way. Like a natural beauty who doesn't have to try hard to get noticed. In a word: Intoxicating.<br />
<br />
A sensual sunset.<br />
<br />
10/10 for me always.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2263440"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2263440#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2262622" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; What an absolutely fantastic perfume. Beautiful citrus for those who find fruity citrus perfumes boring. a mix of fruit, flowers and a note that gives it some very subtle but delicious warmth. I'm surrendered.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2259003"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2259003#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2257081" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2257081" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vilkel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vilkel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2257081ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2257081" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289574">vilkel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-22">08/22/24 04:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A beautiful fragrance. Fresh and sweet, citrusy and coconut notes, which make me think of a sunscreen on a warm, windy day on the beach, yet it is elegant and difficult to fully describe. For sure the most expensive perfume in my collection so I hesitate to use it daily. Unfortunately, it has a weak longevity, a real shame considering the price tag. More suitable for the summer and spring time, totally office safe. Yet, from time to time it gives body odour notes, but I try to convince myself otherwise as the good outweighs the bad here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2257081"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2257081#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256888" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Opens super stong, Leans more female to me, and perfect for spring summer day scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2256888"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2256888#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255878" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; To me it smells like dusty green lemon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2255878"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2255878#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254393" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254393" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="musk195"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="musk195" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254393ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254393" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); The opening is not my style at all, but the dry down is a different story. It starts lemony, almost mixed with mint, and that kind of sticks for quite some time. Then this turns into a fresh musky ambery scent, still citrusy but it doesnt tinkle your nose anymore.if that makes sense?!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2254393"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2254393#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2251326" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2249954" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Heliotrope72"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951661"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1951661.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Heliotrope72" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Love-Tuberose-50889.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50889.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Tuberose"title="Love Tuberose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2249954ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2249954" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951661">Heliotrope72</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-15">08/15/24 03:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>MBTI: ISFP<br />
<br />
<br />
Milky coconut high end lotion you'd put on after a shower. A gentle scent. Great aura. <br />
Nostalgic of some sunscreens, but never overly so, more like a body milk.<br />
</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2249954"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2249954#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2249339" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2249339" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="orpheusdream"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1420663"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1420663.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="orpheusdream" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2249339ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2249339" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1420663">orpheusdream</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-14">08/14/24 14:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get a strange impression of cotton candy in the opening. Like a fluffy citrus-cotton candy. If you can imagine that. There is an unexpected sweetness. It's a little bit strange, and I love it. Then I get the floral bed underneath, which is beautiful. <br />
<br />
Sweet-yellow-floral-citrus-fresh. A bit abstract. A bit unexpected. I would like to compare it to <i>Concrete</i>, they are not similar per se, but they both have this strange 'candy from another planet'-feeling. <br />
<br />
Yellow-floral. Fruity sweetness with moderation. Quite soft around the edges. Its very easy to like and lovely, but it still has its own personality. Clearly leans feminine, because of the fruitiness, the sweetness, and the florals (sorry for gendering). I will certainly enjoy wearing the sample for myself anyway.<br />
<br />
I get why this is so popular. I think the hype might actually be deserved.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2249339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2249339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248615" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2246414" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jaelzion"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1945282"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1945282.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jaelzion" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2246414ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2246414" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1945282">Jaelzion</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-11">08/11/24 22:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bal dAfrique is clean, fresh, and has a citrusy vibe that feels like Dolce &amp; Gabbana Light Blues not-so-basic older sibling. Its airy and light but with a certain sheen that makes it feel grown-up and sophisticated. This fragrance is truly uniquedefinitely not something youll come across twice. If youre looking for something fresh but with an edge, Bal dAfrique is a standout choice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2246414"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2246414#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2245914" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2245914" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bilbo Fraggins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2134921"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2134921.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bilbo Fraggins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2245914ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2245914" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2134921">Bilbo Fraggins</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-11">08/11/24 10:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was told this is a vetiver fragrance. There is absolutely nothing vetiver about this. If anything I would call this a boring fragrance. It almost smells of nothing. There is a plastic balloon smell I do get, but outside of that, it's a hot mess. You would have to pay me to take a bottle of this. Byredo strikes again. <br />
<br />
IG: Bilbo.Fraggins.Elixir</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2245914"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2245914#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2243899" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2243899" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tracytran29"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2018252"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2018252.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tracytran29" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2243899ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2243899" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2018252">tracytran29</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-09">08/09/24 09:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought because I saw so many good reviews! It actually smells very fresh. suitable for hot summer. I feel its smell is very similar to the smell of the yulong from Armani. because it has citrus and vetiver notes. A scent that's not too prominent but can be used every day in the summer if you don't know what scent to use today.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2243899"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2243899#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2242095" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I also got the Byredo hair mist.<br />
I wear this on non special occasions and get a lot of compliments. Longevity is better than what people say on here. <br />
Its very unisex and not masc leaning imo. (Im female)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2242095"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2242095#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239229" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Maybe just on my skin, but smells almost like candied lemons for the first 2 hours then dries down into a beautiful complex woody musky scent. Quite close to the skin but seems to last on me. I do see where people get an expensive soap vibe from, but it is slightly more layered so can get away with it. May have to purchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2239229"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2239229#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239146" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I bought a Byredo trio of mini bottles to sample this. The minis are dabbers, so I put in a sprayer to get the full effect. align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2235789"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2235789#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2235038" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235038" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmilesSunshine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2024727"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmilesSunshine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235038ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235038" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2024727">SmilesSunshine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-31">07/31/24 16:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bal is my best performing Byredo. Its a journey with this one, and on me, never the exact same adventure. Im not sure if anyone else has mentioned, but sometimes I smell ripe smooth fresh mango, like in Asia when its almost creamy gelato. Laced w a clean accord. <br />
<br />
Its a beautiful juxtaposition of something fresh and clean like the color light blue, with something warm and aromatically sweet. Without tasting sweet.<br />
<br />
None of this reflects the notes. But trust me, its a scent of intrigue, complexity, resonance yet ethereal. Sample for self! You wont regret it, <br />
<br />
On  me, its got a classic perfume spine. Which, I love sometimes and dont like others. Shows exceptionally in warm weather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2235038"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2235038#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2233190" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2233190" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JLorenz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309559"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1309559.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JLorenz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2233190ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2233190" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309559">JLorenz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 19:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a more expensive version of Dolce &amp; Gabbana Light Blue... look up the notes, very, very close. If I smelled this on someone I would think they sprayed Dolce &amp; Gabbana Light Blue on an expensive lotion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2233190"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2233190#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232215" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I think the beauty in this number is that it is subtle and more intimate instead of an overbearing fruit bomb.<br />
Runs more female than unisex IMO.  Daytime in spring/summer.<br />
For the ladies. I can see how it could be if not a signature at least a common wear, very nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2227008"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2227008#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2226632" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Im from Germany and IM SELLING THIS PERFUME FOR A LOW PRICE. Send me a message if youre interested.<br />
<br />
+++</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2225325"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2225325#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2224413" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2224413" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jeongh01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255727"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1255727.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jeongh01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Rose-Eau-De-Parfum-71661.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71661.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Rose Eau De Parfum"title="Eau Rose Eau De Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2224413ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2224413" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1255727">Jeongh01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-20">07/20/24 11:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really do dig the fragrance because it's so fresh, elegant and sexy(not overtly so) fragrance but the performance is one of the worst I have yet to experience from my years of being a fragrance lover.  The scent is completely unisex and will fit either sex just fine.  I have heard the hair mist version does last a lot longer but I have not test that myself.  I do love the fragrance so much that i might just get a small bottle of it on holidays when it goes on sale, who knows.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2224413"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2224413#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222971" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2222971" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="suzH99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984762"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1984762.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="suzH99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Red-Temptation-Winter-76788.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76788.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Red Temptation Winter"title="Red Temptation Winter"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2222971ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2222971" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984762">suzH99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 21:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>(I had mistakenly posted this review from February, 2024,under Gypsy Water by accident.  While I also felt that Gypsy Water was unique and faint, it is Bal D'afrique that I was referring to and that I purchased).<br />
<br />
I though this had a lovely, unique scent, but it's very faint - really barely a skin scent with absolutely no sillage. I just couldn't see buying a bottle. I'd love to see Byredo across the board make some actual parfum (or at least a stronger eau de parfum) with the hope of a longer lasting, less intimate scent. I'm a fan of a few of their scents but all are very weak and do not justify the FB price tag for me.<br />
<br />
Update: I did ultimately buy a FB of this because I love it so. I have a travel size that I will keep refilling bc I will need to spray this every 30 minutes. FWIW it did last for a while on a cashmere scarf!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2222971"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2222971#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222812" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; She's a staple.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2222478"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2222478#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222355" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/39745">saramariah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 09:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its beautiful but i dont get the fruits at all, to me its just warm, spicy and maybe a bit flowery.<br />
Not a freshie to my nose more cozy..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2222355"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2222355#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218048" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2218048" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jaydon377"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1796079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jaydon377" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2218048ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2218048" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796079">Jaydon377</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-13">07/13/24 22:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the best freshies out there. The lemon, blackcurrant, and marigold in the opening is stellar. Its a juicy pop of fruits and flowers. The exotic florals really give this a fun uplifting feel to it. The opening lasts for a good amount of time as well. The dry down is mostly vetiver which is not one of my favorite notes however the way it is done in this blend is very nice. The fragrance projects very well on my skin and I get a good 6-8 hours of longevity on skin so I have no complaints with performance. One of the best from Byredo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2218048"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2218048#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217911" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2217911" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="esmerelda4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1008244"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1008244.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="esmerelda4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Harmonist/Yin-Transformation-Eau-de-Parfum-80328.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80328.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yin Transformation Eau de Parfum"title="Yin Transformation Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2217911ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2217911" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1008244">esmerelda4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-13">07/13/24 19:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The most beautiful, signature-worthy perfume. This has been my everyday staple since 2016 and has taken me from college through my 20s. Ive worn it daily to work in NYC, to black tie weddings, beaches, hole in the wall restaurants, Michelin star restaurants, yoga classes, amusement parks, broadway shows, in hot humid 100 degree Tokyo weather, in freezing Ottawa winter weather, and everything in between. Somehow, it has gotten me compliments in each of these very different settings. It is such a lovely perfume soft, fresh, delicate, cool, creamy, floral, woody and fruity for every occasion.<br />
<br />
For some perfumes, you can understand what it smells like by reading the notes. This is not one of those perfumes. It is unexpectedly soft, gentle, creamy, bright and so well blended that none of the notes really jump out. This smells like bottled happiness to me. My only criticism is that the longevity is pretty weak and you will need to reapply if you want it to last the day. I usually get 4-6 hours of wear before I go nose-blind or the perfume dissipates from my skin. This perfume was my first niche luxury purchase and many new perfumes (and obsessions) later, it is still my trusty go-to!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2217911"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2217911#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215234" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215234" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lizhaugen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1781740"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1781740.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lizhaugen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Phlur/Vanilla-Skin-95817.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95817.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Skin"title="Vanilla Skin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215234ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215234" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1781740">Lizhaugen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-11">07/11/24 08:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This made my eyes roll back in my head -- it's absolutely HEAVENLY!  It smells clean and a little edgy yet elevated and refined.  I haven't smelled a fragrance and audibly let out a "wow" in awhile.<br />
<br />
If only the price was lower and/or it lasted longer.  I ordered the Paris Corner Emir Vibrant Vetiver Delight dupe for this, and I'm hoping it's a winner.  It's hard to justify $200+ for something that lasts about an hour on the skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2215234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2215234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214428" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2214428" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="0xrafae"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1544521"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1544521.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="0xrafae" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2214428ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2214428" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1544521">0xrafae</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-10">07/10/24 13:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love the opening of Bal d'Afriqueit's strong and spicy but still has that classic woody-citrus vibe. It adds a fresh twist to a pretty overused concept, something many perfumers havent managed to do long after it started to be popular. The downside is projection and longevity. Pleasure is meant to be shared with others, but this ends up being enjoyed alone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2214428"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2214428#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2213987" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2211094" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gpaisley"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1181355"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1181355.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gpaisley" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2211094ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2211094" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); I hope this is helpful for anyone searching for a similar scent!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2211094"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2211094#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2210396" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
i notice the word uplifting is used frequently in reviews i think  for a good reason - i do feel like i'm live-laugh-loving every time i put it on. i'd wear this in any season if the sun was out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2205692" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="angelaharutyunyan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528360"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="angelaharutyunyan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6458.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bal d'Afrique"title="Bal d'Afrique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2205692ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2205692" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); The problem is that it doesnt really last for even 30 minutes!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2205692"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2205692#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2205432" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2205432" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aduro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1976515"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1976515.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aduro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aerin/Amber-Musk-19056.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.19056.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amber Musk"title="Amber Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2205432ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2205432" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1976515">Aduro</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-02">07/02/24 00:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a nice clean scent. Great everyday wear. <br />
Oakcha makes a descent dupe with even better longevity in case you dont want to spend a fortune.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2205432"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2205432#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2205312" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2205312" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sofiajerten"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1838664"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1838664.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sofiajerten" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giardini-Di-Toscana/Borabora-81632.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81632.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Borabora"title="Borabora"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2205312ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2205312" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1838664">sofiajerten</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-01">07/01/24 20:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am late to the game with Bal dAfrique, but OMG have I fallen in love with it! <br />
<br />
I have tried it a few times in the department store but was never wowed, which I now think is due to the fact that it drowned with all the scents in the air. Anyhow, I was determined to give it a fair shot, as I wanted a fresh scent that has character and this is exactly what it is. Its fresh, woody and aromatic and is definitely a refined scent. It dries down to be a slightly soapy/lotion-y vibe, but not too much as it remains elevated. I find this fragrance very refreshing and classy while having an edge. <br />
<br />
The performance is not great tbh, but because I loved the scent so much, I bought the body cream (in the jar) and it made it last so much more. Huge love for me!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2205312"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2205312#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2205168" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2205168" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mr.ripley"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2182624"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mr.ripley" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2205168ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2205168" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2182624">mr.ripley</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-01">07/01/24 16:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Maybe it's just my skin, but I don't think this is very unisex on me. I'm a guy and I really wanted this to be my scent, but something about this leans just slightly more feminine to my nose. Definitely a beautiful scent and would love to smell this on a woman, but going to return it as it's not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2205168"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2205168#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2204459" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2204459" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ethereal_j"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2031670"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2031670.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ethereal_j" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Arquiste/Indigo-Smoke-75976.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75976.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Indigo Smoke"title="Indigo Smoke"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2204459ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2204459" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2031670">ethereal_j</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-30">06/30/24 23:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the most addictive fresh perfume Ive ever tried, Im not sure what it is but something about the combination of notes is just so enchanting. <br />
<br />
I think of this as a shiny, bright, uplifting scent- and very clean smelling without being too aldehydic.  Id wear this during the day all year long. Projection and longevity are both moderate, and I think this is a truly unisex scent.  I just wish it were cheaper </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6458"comment_id="2204459"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Bal-d-Afrique-6458.html?ccid=2204459#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2203409" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
